thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com
thread.title: CARL
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by CARL

author: CARL
title: CARL
text: I ordered two complete hives, all medium supers. I wanted to use their new foundationless frames with wax coated starter strip and Brushy Mountain happily customized my order, warning me though that the foundationless frames were back-ordered. After a month of waiting, I asked that my order be switched to the regular item which they did and it shipped a day later. Everything arrived in good condition but there was a mistake on the order. This was probably the result of the item change. I called Brushy and they quickly remedied the problem. No hassle, great customer service. I would recommend Brushy Mountain based on my experience.
